messages: I hear ya
Happened to a friend of mine
In this economy
As the prophecy foretold
and?
Word
That's just what he would've said
I'm not really in the mood to talk right now
It happens sometimes
Cool story bro
mhmm
But at what cost?
So let it be written; so let it be done
So... it has come to this
And thus, I die
Is this why fate brought us together?
Be that as it may, still may it be as it be
wise words
There is no escape from destiny
I'm sorry, my brain hurts right now so I can't think of a response
You have reached the extent of my patience. I'm done talking for now
My patience is running low, please stop talking
I don't have the time for this, talk to you later
Will you please just give me a few minutes?
I don't know what to say
